text: Balo -- ''ke nisid'dha kareche allah‌ra sobha, -- ya tini tamra bandadera jan'ya srsti karechena, ara jibika theke bisud'dha bastusamuha?’’ Balo -- ''e-saba e'i duniyara jibane tadera jan'ya yara imana eneche, -- punarjagaranera dine bisesabhabe.’’ E'ibhabe amara amadera nirdesabali bisadabhabe byakhya kari temana sampradayera jan'ya yara jane.
